data.fullContent: The Gartner Company had a hard time getting customers to buy its products, until a company management consultant from Atlanta was called in to help. He did extensive research on the marketplace and looked at the marketing strategy of Gartner's competitors. The consultant strongly suggested that they start marketing their products differently. The marketing manager at Gartner took his advice and tried out the new strategies in a test market, then compiled the results in a sales report.  The manager discovered that customers in the test market were purchasing Gartner's products much more than before.  After this discovery, the company management team decided to permanently revise their marketing strategy for the future.

q1.translation: 高德纳公司(Gartner Company)一直很难让客户购买其产品，直到一位来自亚特兰大的公司管理顾问被叫来帮忙。他对市场进行了广泛的研究，并研究了Gartner竞争对手的营销策略。顾问强烈建议他们开始用不同的方式推销产品。Gartner的市场经理接受了他的建议，在一个测试市场中尝试了这些新策略，然后将结果汇编在一份销售报告中。

The marketing manager at Gartner took his advice and tried out the new strategies in a test market, then compiled the results in a sales report.

options.sentence: With so many decisions that needed to be made, the sales team needed to find reliable information about purchasing specifications for new products.
All the information they gathered helped them predict what equipment new clients would be likely to purchase and made them more attractive to potential clients.
The manager discovered that customers in the test market were purchasing Gartner's products much more than before.
The company generated a lot more interest in its marketing tools through this strategy.

options.sentence: After about six months there, he got a job with a sales training company, which was based in Philadelphia and offered courses in computer programming and sales skills.
A company management consultant from Atlanta was called in to help and conducted extensive research on the marketplace and looked at the marketing strategy of The Gartner Company's competitors.
The marketing manager was confident that he would have an easy time getting the job because he knew how enthusiastic the company's board members were about video games.
The firm's marketing staff created special offers for existing customers, which saved it money in the long run by reducing the need for new hires and increasing customer loyalty.
